title: 试问一个关于mcheli（mc飞机）mod的问题
author: nn1028
txt_content: 我想在服务器中允许玩家使用飞机，但不能使用武器，我在配置文件中好像找不到关于这条的权限，请问一下怎么禁用武器？或者其他办法？{:10_522:}

replies.author: west.myth
replies.txt_content:
nn1028 发表于 2015-3-21 18:56
我把配置文件发上来，你们帮我看看哪条关于禁用武器的选项，谢谢、
ItemDamage = true
Explosion_DestroyBl ...
从这一段看是没有的，你确认发完整了吗？

replies.author: nn1028
replies.txt_content:
我把配置文件发上来，你们帮我看看哪条关于禁用武器的选项，谢谢、
ItemDamage = true
Explosion_DestroyBlock = false
Explosion_FlamingBlock = false
BulletBreakableBlocks = glass_pane, stained_glass_pane
InfinityAmmo = false
InfinityFuel = false
LWeaponAutoFire = false
DismountAll = false
AutoThrottleDownHeli = true
AutoThrottleDownPlane = false
PreventingBroken = false
BreakableOnlyPickaxe = false
AllHeliSpeed = 0.7
AllPlaneSpeed = 0.7
HurtResistantTime = 0.0

InvertMouse = false
MouseSensitivity = 10.0
MouseControlStickModeHeli = false
MouseControlStickModePlane = false
;MouseControlFlightSimMode = true ( Yaw:key, Roll=mouse )
MouseControlFlightSimMode = false
;DisableItemRender = 0 ~ 3 (1 = Recommended)
DisableItemRender = 1
HideKeybind = false
RenderDistanceWeight = 10.0
MobRenderDistanceWeight = 1.0
CreativeTabIconItem = fuel
CreativeTabIconHeli = ah-64
CreativeTabIconPlane = f22a
CreativeTabIconVehicle = mk15
DisableShader = false
AliveTimeOfCartridge = 200
;HitMarkColor = Alpha, Red, Green, Blue
HitMarkColor = 255, 255, 0, 0
SmoothShading = true
EnableModEntityRender = true
DisableRenderLivingSpecials = true

ItemRecipe_Fuel = "ICI", "III", I, iron_ingot, C, coal
ItemRecipe_GLTD = " B ", "IDI", "IRI", B, iron_block, I, iron_ingot, D, diamond, R, redstone
ItemRecipe_Chain = "I I", "III", "I I", I, iron_ingot
ItemRecipe_Parachute = "WWW", "S S", " W ", W, wool, S, string
ItemRecipe_Container = "CCI", C, chest, I, iron_ingot
ItemRecipe_UavStation = "III", "IDI", "IRI", I, iron_ingot, D, diamond, R, redstone_block
ItemRecipe_Stinger = "G  ", "III", "RI ", G, glass, I, Bedrock, R, redstone
ItemRecipe_StingerMissile = "R  ", " I ", "  G", G, Bedrock, I, Bedrock, R, Bedrock

ItemID_GLTD = 28799
ItemID_Chain = 28798
ItemID_Parachute = 28797
ItemID_Container = 28796
ItemID_UavStation = 28795
ItemID_Internal = 28794
ItemID_Stinger = 28900
ItemID_StingerMissile = 28901


[Key config]
http://minecraft.gamepedia.com/Key_codes

KeyUp = 17
KeyDown = 31
KeyRight = 32
KeyLeft = 30
KeySwitchGunner = 35
KeySwitchHovering = 57
KeySwitchWeapon1 = -98
KeySwitchWeapon2 = 34
KeySwitchWeaponMode = 45
KeyZoom = 44
KeyCameraMode = 46
KeyUnmountMob = 21
KeyFlare = 47
KeyExtra = 33
KeyCameraDistanceUp = 201
KeyCameraDistanceDown = 209
KeyFreeLook = 29
KeyGUI = 19

replies.author: huanghaowudi
replies.txt_content: 如果你真想禁，也可以试下直接ban，这个方法有点麻烦

replies.author: nn1028
replies.txt_content: 不用了各位 我已经知道办法了= =
